personal.texto: I am Sergio Adrian Fern√°ndez Figueredo, a passionate technology professional originally from Cuba, currently residing in Montevideo, Uruguay. At 23 years old, I have developed a deep fascination for programming, networking, and technology. My curiosity for learning drives me to be a perfectionist in everything I do.

profesion.texto: I am currently in my fourth year of Computer Engineering. Thanks to my self-driven approach, I have delved into full-stack development, reaching multiple goals and acquiring valuable experience and knowledge in the field.

metas.texto: My objective is to graduate from a top university and continue my personal and professional growth, striving to become the best version of myself. I aspire to work in leading companies in the sector, which will allow me to expand my knowledge and enrich my professional experiences.

profesiona_summary.texto: My profound passion for technological innovation is underpinned by an unwavering commitment to continuous learning and the adoption of industry-leading practices and cutting-edge tools. With a keen focus on problem-solving and collaborative teamwork, I am dedicated to adding strategic value to challenging projects and driving digital transformation within forward-thinking organizations.
